stripped_text: Install Underway Renovation faceup. Whenever you advance Underway Renovation, trash the top card of the Runner's stack (or top 2 cards instead if there are 4 or more advancement tokens on Underway Renovation).
text:
Install Underway Renovation faceup.
Whenever you advance Underway Renovation, trash the top card of the Runner's stack (or top 2 cards instead if there are 4 or more advancement tokens on Underway Renovation).
title: Underway Renovation
